pad.js

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/glob/node_modules/minimatch/node_modules/brace-expansion/test/pad.js
  • Last modified: 2015-08-29 16:13:52 +0200

var test = require('tape'); var expand = require('..');

test('pad', function(t) {

t.deepEqual(expand('{9..11}'), [
  '9', '10', '11'
]);
t.deepEqual(expand('{09..11}'), [
  '09', '10', '11'
]);
t.end();

});
